img1.name: 12/01/2024 - Priory vs. MICDS #34
img1.annotation: This photograph, taken on December 20th, 2024, captures an intense moment from the Metro League matchup between the Priory Ravens (in blue) and the MICDS Rams. The depth of field and lighting draw attention to the players, while the fast shutter speed freezes the action, conveying the game's intensity. The composition, with player number 56 as a focal point, guides the viewer's eye and adds to the dynamic feel of the image. Overall, it effectively captures the excitement and narrative of the game.

img2.name: 02/24/2024 - Priory Basketball District Championship #69
img2.annotation: This photograph, taken on February 24th, 2024, captures a pivotal moment in the Priory Basketball District Championship against Whitfield, where the Ravens emerged victorious. The depth of field and lighting draw attention to the players, with the foreground sharply in focus and the background slightly blurred, emphasizing the action. The fast shutter speed freezes the motion, highlighting the intensity of the game. The composition, featuring a player from Whitfield defending against a Raven dribbling the ball, creates a dynamic and engaging scene. Overall, the photograph effectively captures the excitement and triumph of the game.

img3.name: 08/20/2024 - Priory vs. Jefferson #15
img3.annotation: This photograph, taken on August 20th, 2024, captures a moment from the Ravens' home opener football game against Jefferson. The depth of field and lighting draw attention to the players at the line of scrimmage, with the foreground sharply in focus and the background slightly blurred, emphasizing the tension before the play. The fast shutter speed freezes the moment, highlighting the readiness and intensity of the players. The composition, with players from both teams lined up and ready for action, creates a dynamic and engaging scene. Overall, the photograph effectively captures the anticipation and energy of the game.

img4.name: 2/24/2024 - Priory Basketball District Championship #08
img4.annotation: This image captures the triumphant moment after the Basketball District Championship between the Priory Ravens and Duchesne, where the Priory Ravens emerged victorious, marking their first district championship win in 55 years. Pictured throwing his fist in the air is the esteemed basketball coach, Bobby McCormick, who has hundreds of wins under his belt. This historic victory is a testament to his dedication and the team's hard work. The photograph stands out due to its impeccable timing, capturing the exact moment of celebration, and its composition, with Coach McCormick centrally framed against the jubilant team and fans. The use of a fast shutter speed ensures sharpness, while proper exposure and lighting highlight the key subjects. The genuine expressions of joy and triumph add a powerful emotional element, making this a standout piece of sports photography.

img5.name: 2/2/24 - Priory vs. Seckman #21
img5.annotation: This image captures the electrifying moment during the Wickenheiser Cup playoffs where Priory faced Seckman, securing a significant win. The photograph features Freddy Gaertner '26, a standout player, leaping into the glass in celebration, with a sea of cheering spectators in the background. The image is remarkable for its perfect timing, capturing Freddy's exuberant leap, and its dynamic composition, with Freddy centrally framed against the enthusiastic fans. The use of a fast shutter speed ensures the action is frozen sharply, while the lighting highlights Freddy and the crowd's excitement. The genuine expressions of joy and the intensity of the moment add a powerful emotional element, making this a standout piece of sports photography.

img6.name: 1/20/23 - Priory v. St. Dominic (Monk Night) #6
img6.annotation: This image captures the exciting moment from Monk Night on January 20th, 2023, where the Priory Basketball team honored the Monks of Saint Louis Priory School Abbey. On this special night, Priory also unveiled their new mascot, a Raven, for the first time in front of the entire school. The photograph features the Raven mascot proudly standing in front of a cheering crowd, with “PRIORY” emblazoned across its chest. While this isn't traditional sports photography, it has become one of my most famous photos, being featured on the cover of the Priory Magazine, as well as the cover of The Record, and online in various places. The image is notable for its perfect timing, capturing the excitement of the mascot reveal, and its dynamic composition, with the Raven centrally framed against the enthusiastic fans. The use of a fast shutter speed ensures the action is frozen sharply, while the lighting highlights the mascot and the crowd's energy. The genuine expressions of joy and the significance of the event add a powerful emotional element, making this a standout piece of photography.

img7.name: 1/11/24 Priory vs. Northwest #6
img7.annotation: This powerful image captures Priory Forward, Grant McGowan '24, as he maneuvers through the ice with the puck during a hockey game against Northwest, which Priory won 5-1. The photograph focuses on Grant's face, showcasing his determination and focus as he strives to outmaneuver his defender. The intensity of the moment is highlighted by the sharpness and clarity of the image, with Grant's expression and the dynamic movement of the game frozen in time. The composition centers on Grant, emphasizing his skill and the competitive spirit of the match. This image not only documents a key moment in the game but also exemplifies the dedication and athleticism inherent in hockey, making it a standout piece of sports photography.

img8.name: 1/11/24 Priory vs. Northwest #18
img8.annotation: This vibrant image captures the exhilarating moment on January 11th, 2024, when Wynn O'Keefe scored his first varsity goal. Wynn is seen throwing his fist in the air, surrounded by jubilant teammates celebrating his achievement. The photograph stands out for its dynamic composition, with Wynn at the center, his expression of triumph and joy clearly visible. The use of a fast shutter speed freezes the moment perfectly, highlighting the excitement and energy of the celebration. The lighting accentuates the players, making them pop against the background. This image not only documents a significant personal milestone for Wynn but also exemplifies the camaraderie and spirit of the team, making it a memorable piece of sports photography.

img9.name: 4/10/24 - Priory vs. Lutheran North #23
img9.annotation: This image captures the intense moment on April 10th, 2024, as John Spivey '24, a baseball commit to MIT, loads up on his back foot to take a swing during a Priory Baseball game against Lutheran North. The photograph highlights John's focused expression and poised stance, emphasizing his determination and skill. The composition centers on John, with his raised foot and bat ready to strike, showcasing the precision and timing crucial in baseball. The use of a fast shutter speed freezes the action, while the lighting accentuates John's form and the details of his uniform. This image not only documents a key moment in the game but also exemplifies the dedication and athleticism required to excel in baseball, making it a standout piece of sports photography.
